snippet.title: Shatter Keep Launch Trailer | Freethrow
snippet.description:
We're excited to announce that our game is coming to Steam in early May 2021! Wishlist the game so you can download it as soon as it goes live. Happy hunting! 👹🏰

Wishlist us on steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1588190/Shatter_Keep/

____________________________________________________________________

Shatter Keep is an asymmetrical multiplayer game where 3 survivor players try to escape the castle and 1 randomly selected monster player attempts to eliminate them. Survivors must complete a list of sequenced objectives to unlock the castle exits while arming traps, lighting torches and avoiding the turned monster before the timer expires.

____________________________________________________________________

Check us out on your favourite social media!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/freethrowgames
Instagram: https://instagram.com/freethrowgames
